sources.summary: Comprehensive review of state-of-the-art churn prediction models achieving >90% accuracy rates
key_findings: Multiple studies demonstrate >90% accuracy in churn prediction

5% increase in retention can boost profitability by 25-95%

ROI positive within 30-day implementation period

key_findings: 42% reduction in SaaS customer churn

sources.journal: Machine Learning and Knowledge Discovery in Databases
